learning_outcomes.description: Work independently as part of a team with diverse backgrounds towards authentic IT innovation solutions
Apply innovation processes to open ended problems
Collect and analyse data about people and problems
Design and prototype innovation solutions to identified open ended problems
Communicate problems and solutions to technical and non-technical stakeholders

assessments.category: Participation/ Student contribution, Presentation, Role play/ Simulation
assessments.task_description:
Participation in the weekly seminar and studios, including presentation and practice sessions.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Translation (MT) are emerging tools that may support students in completing this assessment task. Students may appropriately use AI and/or MT in completing this assessment task. Students must clearly reference any use of AI or MT in each instance. A failure to reference generative AI or MT use may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.

assessments.late_submission: You will receive a mark of 0 if this assessment is submitted late.
assessments.additional_info: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
